comment: Membership in the Caratheodory's construction. Similar to ~ carageneld , but here "less then or equal to" is used, instead of equality. This is Remark 113D of [Fremlin1] p. 21. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
